column1: #Text=" Mako says : " Do you have any leads ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 've been on the phone all morning , but nothing yet .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm afraid her polar bear dog is missing as well .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Then where do we start ?
#Text=" Lin says : " My guess is the Equalists are hiding underground in the maze of tunnels beneath the city .
#Text=" Asami says : " Underground ... just like my father 's secret factory .
#Text=When those chi blockers had me in their truck , it sounded like we drove into a tunnel !
#Text=" Mako says : " I know where to start looking !
#Text=" Lin says : " Wherever Amon is keeping Korra , I bet that 's where my officers are too .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Let 's bring them all home , Lin .
